verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H4256>companies<s%> that <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> by <S%H4256>course<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over the <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over the <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and the <S%H8269>stewards<s%> over all the <S%H7399>substance<s%> and <S%H4735>possession<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, with the <S%H5631>officers<s%>, and with the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, and with all the valiant <S%H2428>men<s%>, unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> upon his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> me, my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and my <S%H5971>people<s%>: As for me, I had in mine <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4496>rest<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and for the <S%H1916%H7272>footstool<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, and had made <S%H3559>ready<s%> for the <S%H1129>building<s%>:

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, because thou hast been a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

Howbeit the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> me before all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: for he hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to be the <S%H5057>ruler<s%>; and of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>; and among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> he <S%H7521>liked<s%> me to make me <S%H4427>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

And of all my <S%H1121>sons<s%>, (for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>,) he hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> and my <S%H2691>courts<s%>: for I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> him to be my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, if he be <S%H2388>constant<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Now therefore in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H1875>seek<s%> for all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: that ye may <S%H3423>possess<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, and leave it for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> for your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

¶ And thou, <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3045>know<s%> thou the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and with a <S%H2655>willing<s%> <S%H5315>mind<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1875>searcheth<s%> all <S%H3824>hearts<s%>, and <S%H995>understandeth<s%> all the <S%H3336>imaginations<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>: if thou <S%H1875>seek<s%> him, he will be <S%H4672>found<s%> of thee; but if thou <S%H5800>forsake<s%> him, he will cast thee <S%H2186>off<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

Take <S%H7200>heed<s%> now; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

¶ Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%>, and of the <S%H1004>houses<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H1597>treasuries<s%> thereof, and of the upper <S%H5944>chambers<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2315>parlours<s%> thereof, and of the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>,

And the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of all that he had by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, of the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and of all the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, of the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and of the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944>things<s%>:

Also for the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and for all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

He gave of <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for things of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, for all <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of all manner of <S%H5656>service<s%>; silver also for all <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>, for all <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of every kind of <S%H5656>service<s%>:

Even the <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H4501>candlesticks<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and for their <S%H5216>lamps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, and for the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof: and for the <S%H4501>candlesticks<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>, both for the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, and also for the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof, according to the <S%H5656>use<s%> of every <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>.

And by <S%H4948>weight<s%> he gave <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of <S%H4635>shewbread<s%>, for every <S%H7979>table<s%>; and likewise <S%H3701>silver<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>:

Also <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H4207>fleshhooks<s%>, and the <S%H4219>bowls<s%>, and the <S%H7184>cups<s%>: and for the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3713>basons<s%> he gave gold by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>bason<s%>; and likewise silver by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>bason<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>:

And for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H2212>refined<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>; and <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>, that spread <S%H6566>out<s%> their wings, and <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
All this, said David, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made me <S%H7919>understand<s%> in <S%H3791>writing<s%> by his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon me, even all the <S%H4399>works<s%> of this <S%H8403>pattern<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it: <S%H3372>fear<s%> not, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, even my <S%H430>God<s%>, will be with thee; he will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> thee, nor <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thee, until thou hast <S%H3615>finished<s%> all the <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And, behold, the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, even they shall be with thee for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and there shall be with thee for all manner of <S%H4399>workmanship<s%> every <S%H5081>willing<s%> skilful <S%H2451>man<s%>, for any manner of <S%H5656>service<s%>: also the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> will be wholly at thy <S%H1697>commandment<s%>.
